docs.text: Monarch API monarch-api is a FastAPI for browsing the knowledge graph produced by the Monarch Initiative. API Reference Data Response Model For developers You can install monarch-api from GitHub as follows: # clone the repo git clone https://github.com/monarch-initiative/monarch-api # cd into the folder cd monarch-api # install poetry install
docs.title: Monarch API

docs.text: Association Endpoints _get_all_associations async Retrieves all associations for a given entity, or between two entities Parameters: Name Type Description Default pagination PaginationParams description . Defaults to Depends(). Depends() category str description . Defaults to None. None predicate str description . Defaults to None. None subject str description . Defaults to None. None object str description . Defaults to None. None entity str description . Defaults to None. None Returns: Name Type Description AssociationResults AssociationResults description _get_association_between async Retrieves all associations from an object to a subject Parameters: Name Type Description Default subject str description required object str description required pagination PaginationParams description . Defaults to Depends(). Depends() Returns: Name Type Description AssociationResults AssociationResults description _get_association_from async Retrieves all associations from an entity as the object Parameters: Name Type Description Default object str description required pagination PaginationParams description . Defaults to Depends(). Depends() Returns: Name Type Description _type_ description _get_association_to async Retrieves all associations to an entity as the subject Parameters: Name Type Description Default subject str description required pagination PaginationParams description . Defaults to Depends(). Depends() Returns: Name Type Description AssociationResults AssociationResults description
